Write it in.

If you want the editorial to draw attention to a subject, you want to tell me something, send a press release if you have any questions, send us a message right off the website. Messages from the COMMITMENT site are read in writing.If you want us to call you back or write, tell me how you can get in touch.♪ Keep in mind that the messages that come from this page are not published.

In Volgograd, 75 million will renovate the oldest school.

Society08.02.2024 20:51
Comments0
08.02.2024 20:51

In Volgograd, 75 million roubles were allocated for the major repair of school No.89 in the Dzerzin district of Volgograd. According to V102. RU, with reference to the government ' s site, an electronic auction has been announced for a number of work at the educational institution. In particular, ventilated facades, caps, repairs of sewage, heating, hot water, sewage and lighting systems are planned. ...
